SELECT * FROM shop_account t WHERE t.sys_user_id = (SELECT mu.sys_user_id FROM merchant_user mu WHERE mu.merchant_code = #{merchantCode})

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop_account ( sys_user_id, total_money, usable_money, frozen_money, recharge_money, status, security_code ) VALUES ( #{sysUserId}, #{totalMoney}, #{usableMoney}, #{frozenMoney}, #{rechargeMoney}, #{status}, #{securityCode} );
